alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 22 at 11:54PM AKST until December 25 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM FRIDAY TO 6 PM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 40 to 55 mph with gusts to 70 mph expected. * WHERE...Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills. * WHEN...From 6 AM Friday to 6 PM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down power lines. Widespread power outages may occur. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills
